name: ceqsal
params: setvar s0, class c0, wff w0, wff w1

stmt.origin: ax-mp(wb(wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), w0)), w1), wcel(c0, universe))

body.origin:
|- wb(wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), w0)), w1)
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wi(wcel(c0, universe), wb(wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), w0)), w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), w0)), w1)
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wi(wcel(c0, universe), wb(wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), w0)), w1))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, universe), wb(wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), w0)), w1))
-| wnf(s0, w1)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w0, w1))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), w0)), w1)
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wnf(s0, w1)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w0, w1))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)

comment: A representation of explicit substitution of a class for a variable, inferred from an implicit substitution hypothesis. (Contributed by NM, 18-Aug-1993.)
